tasks.task: Drive a combine or agricultural equipment through a field.
subtasks: Sit in the seat of the combine/harvester.
Operate the controls to navigate the equipment through the field.
Check the crop condition while moving through the field.

tasks.task: Prepare the combine for field work.
subtasks: Lubricate parts of the equipment after use.

tasks.task: Monitor and maintain air conditioning systems on agricultural equipment.
subtasks: Check the functionality of air conditioning systems during operations.
Address any issues with air conditioning systems as they arise.

tasks.task: Adapt daily work plan based on weather conditions.
subtasks: Adjust tasks depending on current weather (e.g., soil moisture, temperature).
Delay certain operations if weather conditions are unsuitable (e.g., rain, high humidity).
Load seeds into the machinery for播种.
Position the machinery for efficient chemical application.
Remove excess dirt and debris from the equipment.
